import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../producerDashboard.css'; import { FaUser, FaCogs, FaSignOutAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; const ProducerDashboard = () => { const [showRepasseForm, setShowRepasseForm] = useState(false); const [repasseData, setRepasseData] = useState(null); // Dados simulados const handleRepasseClick = () => { setShowRepasseForm(true); }; const handleFormSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(event.target); const data = Object.fromEntries(formData.entries()); setRepasseData(data); alert('Dados enviados com sucesso!'); setShowRepasseForm(false); }; const handleBackClick = () => { setShowRepasseForm(false); }; return (
